entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 36 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Ice fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
